title: VCMI town structures format
description: Format used to define structures visible on town screen in VCMI

hidden.description: If upgrade, this building will replace parent animation but will not alter its behaviour

animation.description: Main animation file for this building

area.description: Area that indicate when building is selected. Must be 8-bit image

border.description: Golden border around building, displayed when building is selected

z.description: Position on screen. Buildings with higher value will be drawn on top of other buildings
